conditions.name: This is a condition without a color provided

SavingsAssistantEnabled.description: Controls the visibility of the savings assistant feature that has its own navigation bar section.

CarFinanceEnabled.description: Controls the visibility of the car finance question that appears on the quick quote polling screen.

DashboardMoreWaysToSaveEnabled.description: Controls the visibility of the more ways to save section that appears on the dashboard.

[OBSELETE] Owned Vehicle Alert.description: The owned vehicle alert displays when we need to display to the user a message whilst they're using the vehicle researcher.

OwnedVehicleAlertEnabled.description: Controls the visibility of the owned vehicle alert

OwnedVehicleAlertTitle.description: The title shown on the owned vehicle alert when OwnedVehicleAlertEnabled is true.

defaultValue.value:
The government has extended all MOTs by 6 months from 30 March.

If your MOT has not yet expired, youâ€™ll see your original MOT expiry date on the next screen. The new date will show once your original MOT has expired.

OwnedVehicleAlertMessage.description: The message shown on the owned vehicle alert when OwnedVehicleAlertEnabled is true.

Auto Insurance Renewal Question.description: The question appears on the QuickQuote polling screen that asks users if they would be interested in automatically renewing their insurance policy.

AutoRenewalQuestionEnabled.description: [OBSELETE] Controls the visibility of the V1 auto insurance renewal question that appears on the QuickQuote polling screen

AutoRenewalQuestionV2Enabled.description: Controls the visibility of the V2 auto insurance renewal question that appears on the QuickQuote polling screen

AutoRenewalQuestionV3Enabled.description: Controls the visibility of the V3 auto insurance renewal question that appears on the QuickQuote polling screen
